q1: Do you think Chelsea can finish in the top 4 of the Premier League this year?
a1: I think they will really struggle to make top 4.
q2: Will the new manager last more than two seasons at the club?
a2: I think Maurizio Sarri will last quite a few seasons with Chelsea. He seems to be doing well.
q3: Do you think Chelsea will finish top 4?
a3: I'm not sure Chelsea will be able to finish top 4 this year.
q4: I'm not sure, it could be second or second
a4: Maybe they will do well, Chelsea had 14 players at the World Cup this summer.
a5: Hazard is the star of the team
